arrays.title: Two Sum
arrays.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

arrays.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
arrays.description: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day. Find maximum profit.

arrays.title: Contains Duplicate
arrays.description: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array.

arrays.title: Product of Array Except Self
arrays.description: Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all elements except nums[i].

arrays.title: Maximum Subarray
arrays.description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray with the largest sum, and return its sum.

arrays.title: Maximum Product Subarray
arrays.description: Given an integer array nums, find a contiguous non-empty subarray within the array that has the largest product.

arrays.title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
arrays.description: Find the minimum element in a rotated sorted array with unique elements.

arrays.title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
arrays.description: Search for a target value in a rotated sorted array. Return its index or -1 if not found.

arrays.title: 3Sum
arrays.description: Given an integer array nums, return all unique triplets that sum to zero.

arrays.title: Container With Most Water
arrays.description: Find two lines that together with the x-axis form a container that holds the most water.

arrays.title: Merge Intervals
arrays.description: Given an array of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals and return non-overlapping intervals.

arrays.title: Non-overlapping Intervals
arrays.description: Given an array of intervals, return the minimum number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest non-overlapping.

arrays.title: Insert Interval
arrays.description: Insert a new interval into a sorted list of non-overlapping intervals and merge if necessary.

arrays.title: Rotate Image
arrays.description: Rotate an n x n 2D matrix representing an image by 90 degrees clockwise in-place.

arrays.title: Spiral Matrix
arrays.description: Given an m x n matrix, return all elements of the matrix in spiral order.

arrays.title: Set Matrix Zeroes
arrays.description: Given an m x n matrix, if an element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0.

arrays.title: Word Search
arrays.description: Given a 2D board and a word, find if the word exists in the grid using adjacent cells.

strings.title: Valid Anagram
strings.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.

strings.title: Valid Parentheses
strings.description: Given a string s containing just characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.

strings.title: Valid Palindrome
strings.description: Given a string s, return true if it is a palindrome when considering only alphanumeric characters.

strings.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
strings.description: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

strings.title: Longest Repeating Character Replacement
strings.description: Find the length of the longest substring containing the same letter after replacing at most k characters.

strings.title: Minimum Window Substring
strings.description: Given two strings s and t, return the minimum window substring of s such that every character in t is included in the window.

strings.title: Group Anagrams
strings.description: Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order.

strings.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
strings.description: Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring in s.

strings.title: Palindromic Substrings
strings.description: Given a string s, return the number of palindromic substrings in it.

strings.title: Encode and Decode Strings
strings.description: Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to a string and decode the string back to the original list.

graphs.title: Number of Islands
graphs.description: Given an m x n 2D binary grid which represents a map of '1's (land) and '0's (water), return the number of islands.

graphs.title: Clone Graph
graphs.description: Given a reference of a node in a connected undirected graph, return a deep copy (clone) of the graph.

graphs.title: Course Schedule
graphs.description: Determine if you can finish all courses given the prerequisites. This is a cycle detection problem.

graphs.title: Course Schedule II
graphs.description: Return the ordering of courses you should take to finish all courses, or return empty array if impossible.

graphs.title: Pacific Atlantic Water Flow
graphs.description: Given heights of a continent, find all coordinates where water can flow to both Pacific and Atlantic oceans.

graphs.title: Number of Connected Components in an Undirected Graph
graphs.description: Find the number of connected components in an undirected graph with n vertices.

graphs.title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
graphs.description: Given an unsorted array of integers, return the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.

graphs.title: Graph Valid Tree
graphs.description: Given n nodes and edges, determine if they form a valid tree (connected and no cycles).

graphs.title: Alien Dictionary
graphs.description: Given words from an alien language, deduce the order of letters in the alien alphabet.

graphs.title: Word Ladder
graphs.description: Given two words and a dictionary, find the shortest transformation sequence length.
